product_name: Shimano XT M785 Hydraulic Disc Brake - Front
long_description: The Shimano XT M785 hydraulic front disc brake offers superb, responsive braking with to plenty of power and modulation, easy adjustment and a fade-resistant, heat-dissipating design.
short_description: The Shimano XT M785 hydraulic front disc brake offers superb, responsive braking with to plenty of power and modulation, easy adjustment and a fade-resistant, heat-dissipating design.
